about_the_game:
About


Horse Reality is a free-to-play in-development realistic horse management simulator. Manage your own estate where you breed and train your horses for a variety of competitions and conformations shows. Buy and sell horses from players all over the world, and join the world of Horse Reality!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Breeding & Genetics

Horse Reality’s breeding system is based on real life science and genetic mapping, allowing for more than half a billion different combinations. Horses can inherit their colours, potential, exterior, and health to ensure that every horse is unique. Breed horses for competitions or conference shows, sell and buy on the market, train and care for them, all while trying to become the best breeder you can!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Community

Join a community of more than 300 000 players in a supportive, inclusive, friendly, wholesome place! Buy and sell your horses in the marketplace, discuss in the forum, join clubs about your favourite breed, or perhaps start your own? Decide how you want to play!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features

  • A breeding system based on real genetics!
  • 28 different breeds, with more coming soon!
  • 557 235 499 genetic combinations, and growing!
  • An active and engaging community!
  • Join a variety of competitions, conformation shows, marketplaces, and much more!
